rows.label: tlk47400164_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Sometimes you can see the aurora
from here. It's pretty, for sure...

rows.label: tlk47400164_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But there are monsters that only come
out when the aurora's around.

rows.label: tlk47400164_02_msg0003
rows.name: Like Drac Lexos and Selmo Gradys...

rows.label: tlk47400164_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I wonder why they only come out
when there's an aurora, though?
Funny creatures.
